pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, June 30, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Madrid, Spain

Private meetings

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a breakfast meeting with the Prime Minister of Australia, Anthony Albanese.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of South Korea, Yoon Suk-yeol.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the North Atlantic Council Plenary Session.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of welcoming remarks and host broadcast coverage

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

Palace of Moncloa

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a working luncheon hosted by the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

Closed to media

4:15 p.m.The Prime Minister will deliver a joint statement with the Prime Minister of Spain, Pedro Sánchez.

Palace of Moncloa

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

9:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Ottawa.

Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport

Closed to media

National Capital Region, Canada

11:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Ottawa.

Shell Aerocentre
MacDonald-Cartier International Airport

Closed to media
